column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLThis MSc, is aimed at doctors who are looking to further their knowledge and skills in clinical neurology. The fully interactive programme provides scientific and clinical knowledge through online lectures, several opportunities of clinical case discussion, case-based learning through online forums and video conference with tutors and research supervisors. It is delivered online and an option of mixed mode (online and face to face teaching/research) is available.
column7: Register your interest in graduate study at UCL
